values: Ruth: May the Redeemer's Name Be RenownedRuth: May the Redeemer's Name Be Renowned

The book of Ruth exists to show us that God is always at work, even in our darkest hours, to bring us to worship him and display his glory.The book of Ruth exists to show us that God is always at work, even in our darkest hours, to bring us to worship him and display his glory.
